user_input:
Please create hourly hydrogen demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios.
Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format.
No need to access any PLEXOS database for now
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications.

function_args.user_input: Generate hourly hydrogen demand profiles for TYNDP 2026 scenarios NT, NT_HE, NT_LE for years 2030, 2035, 2040, 2050 with node splitting enabled. No PLEXOS DB access.

tasks.description: Generate hourly hydrogen demand profiles for TYNDP 2026 scenarios 'NT', 'NT_HE', and 'NT_LE' for years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050 with node splitting enabled.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select the most appropriate {entity_type} from the following list.

tasks.description: Export the generated hourly hydrogen demand profiles to TST-format workbooks for the TYNDP study team.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select the most appropriate {entity_type} from the following list.
